      • buildRosTopicMessageString

        public static RosTopicMessageString buildRosTopicMessageString(java.lang.String op,
                                                               java.lang.String topic,
                                                               java.lang.String type,
                                                               java.lang.String msg)
        This method build a std_msgs/String RosMessage object
        参数:
        op - publish
        topic - The string of the topic name
        type - std_msgs/String
        msg - The String Message to be send to the topic
        返回:
        An object of class RosTopicMessageString(std_msgs/String)

      • buildRosSrvMessageAddress

        public static RosSrvMessageAddress buildRosSrvMessageAddress(java.lang.String op,
                                                             java.lang.String service,
                                                             java.lang.String address)
        This method builds a RosSrvMessage specifically for the address service call
        参数:
        op - call_service
        service - The string of the service name
        address - The string of the inspection address
        返回:
        An object of the class RosSrvMessageAddress

      • buildRosSrvMessageGenReport

        public static RosSrvMessageGenReport buildRosSrvMessageGenReport(java.lang.String op,
                                                                 java.lang.String service,
                                                                 java.lang.String cmd)
        This method builds a RosSrvMessage specifically for the generating resport service call
        参数:
        op - call_service
        service - The string of the service name
        cmd - The instruction string to generate report
        返回:
        An object of the class RosSrvMessageGenReport
